gate.learning
Class LightWeightLearningApi

java.lang.Object
  gate.learning.LightWeightLearningApi
All Implemented Interfaces:
Benchmarkable
public class LightWeightLearningApi
extends Object
implements Benchmarkable

Do all the main learning tasks, such as obtaining the feature vectors from GATE annotations, training and application. Also filtering out some negative examples if want.

Field Summary

          Object of the NLP feature list.

          The annotationSet for the resulting annotations by application of models.
